## APIFeatures class

A class to filter, sort, limit and paginate query params

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class APIFeatures<T extends Document, U extends {
    sort?: string;
    fields?: string;
    limit?: string;
    paginate?: string;
}> 
```

## Example


```
Rest Endpoint `/api/v1/trips?difficulty=medium&ratingsAverage[gte]=4.7&ratingsAverage[lt]=5.0&sort=-price,ratingsAverage&fields=name,ratings,price&paginate=1&limit=10`
req.query = {

              difficulty: 'medium',
              ratingsAverage: { gte: '4.7', lt: '5.0' },
              sort: '-price,ratingsAverage',
              fields: 'name,ratings,price',
              limit: '10'
}

```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [filter()](./tours.apifeatures.filter.md) |  | Find Document properties that matches value in Collection |
|  [limitFields()](./tours.apifeatures.limitfields.md) |  | Show only the Document properties equals to fields params (Field Projection) |
|  [paginate()](./tours.apifeatures.paginate.md) |  | Return number of according to the pagination and limit |
|  [sort()](./tours.apifeatures.sort.md) |  | Sort the Document by sort params in req.query |
